Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people who need to communicate over a distance.
The student can include a device in the drawing that uses sound to send and receive messages.
The student can show how the device they designed uses a string to help sounds travel between the two people.
The student can use only the materials shown in the drawing to help solve the communication problem.
The student can illustrate how the device helps communication over a distance.
The student can explain, either in the drawing or by writing, how using this device makes life easier.
